name: A Monster Girl High Speed Runner Racing Game for Girls
name_original: A Monster Girl High Speed Runner Racing Game for Girls
description:
Launch that high speed running monster girl and be amused by the adventure of the century!

This exciting fun game will take you an adventure you've never been before! It's so easy! Just let that monster girl run and run until you collect all the coins. Travel as far as you can and be the highest scorer of the game! What are you waiting for? Download now!

How to play the game
> Tap to jump
> Hold the longer to jump higher
> Collect Coins and dont fall

Game Features
> Addictive game
> Fun adventure
> Thrilling and exciting
